## Test Plan / 测试计划

- [ ] Backend tests pass (`make test-backend`)
- [ ] 后端测试通过（`make test-backend`）
- [ ] iOS tests pass (`make test-ios`) or N/A
- [ ] iOS 测试通过（`make test-ios`）或不适用
- [ ] Manually verified on device/simulator
- [ ] 已在真机/模拟器手动验证

## Checklist / 自查清单

- [ ] My code follows the existing style conventions
- [ ] 代码遵循现有风格规范
- [ ] I have not broken any existing tests
- [ ] 没有破坏已有测试
- [ ] New functionality has corresponding tests (if applicable)
- [ ] 新功能已补充对应测试（如适用）
